mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL FROM dual
insert into Notice (nno, ntitle, ncontent, nmaincategory, nsubcategory, nattachoname, nattachtype, nattachdata, ncreatedat, nupdatedat) VALUES (#{nno}, #{ntitle}, #{ncontent}, #{nmaincategory}, #{nsubcategory}, #{nattachoname}, #{nattachtype}, #{nattachdata}, systimestamp, systimestamp)
mapper.update: update Notice set ntitle=#{ntitle}, ncontent=#{ncontent}, nmaincategory=#{nmaincategory}, nsubcategory=#{nsubcategory}, nattachoname=#{nattachoname}, nattachtype=#{nattachtype},nattachdata=#{nattachdata}, nupdatedat=systimestamp where nno=#{nno}
